title: Project 1: Local Wire
desc: Local Wire was our first Group Project in the UCF Coding Bootcamp. In this Project, we demonstrated our basic skills of HTML, CSS, JS, API's, and AJAX calls.

title: Project 2: Movie A-Lister
desc: Movie A-Lister was our second Group Project in the UCF Coding Bootcamp. In this Project, we demonstrated our skills using MySql and Sequelize Database structure. This project implemented the MVC model, CRUD operations, and Handlebars as our view component.

title: Random Password Generator
desc: Random Password Generator was our third assignment in the UCF Coding Bootcamp Course

title: UCF Coding Quiz
desc: UCF Coding Quiz was our fourth assignment in the UCF Coding Bootcamp Course

title: Work Day Scheduler
desc: Work Day Scheduler was our fifth assignment in the UCF Coding Bootcamp Course

title: Weather Dashboard
desc: Random Password Generator was our sixth assignment in the UCF Coding Bootcamp Course

title: Note Taker Application
desc: Note Taker App was our homework assignment for Week 9 in the UCF Coding Bootcamp Course. This was our first assignment deployed to Heroku

title: Eat Da Burger Application
desc: Eat Da Burger Application was our homework assignment for Week 13 in the UCF Coding Bootcamp Course. This project demonstrated our experience with MySql, dynamically adding date to our DB, basic CRUD operations, and deployment to Heroku.
